channel.title: Interesting error
channel.description: So i made wise old man spawn in the jungle with a teleport to him and hes a level 230 and such so everything worked out i set him to have an attack string and examine well whenever i even scroll over him i get an error in the server cmd area and it makes my client disconnect and i have to restart whats wrong with it? I believe its coded right

item.title: Interesting error
item.dc:creator: @danike danike
item.description:
@danike wrote:

i cant even load it any more can you help me on teamviewer :[ my client just stopped working

edit: not only did i fix my client but the code worked
thanks i had that originally and it didnt work weird

Read full topic

I gave the code

item.title: Interesting error
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“danike, post:4, topic:406872”]theres no acctual compile error but i can post what i have the npc set as

if(i == 2253)
{
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[1];
class5.aStringArray66[1] = “Attack”;

class5.aString65 = “Wise Old Man”;
class5.anInt61 = 230;
class5.aByteArray89 = “He is wise… He also drops a partyhat.”.getBytes();
}
what did i do wrong here[/quote]
No, what does the server cmd say or your client, when you click on it.

Read full topic
